Source code for spin_base.models.ribbit

from django.db import models
from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse
from spin_base.models.user import UserProfile


[docs]class Ribbit(models.Model):
	'''
	The Ribbit class is the center of the application. It represents what the users can condivide with other ones:
	-simple Ribbit: only-text;
	-multimedia Ribbit: text+multimedia (images or videos).
	Since a Ribbit could contain etherogeneous contents, it's important to provide a robust	implementation for it.
	'''
	
	publisher = models.ForeignKey(UserProfile)
	'''
	The publisher represents the user who has posted the Ribbit; this is a one to many relationship: one Ribbit can
	be published by only an user, but one user can post many ribbits.
	'''
	
	content = models.TextField(max_length=140)
	'''
	This is the text content of the ribbit, it's got a maximum length of 140 character.
	'''
	
	date = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
	'''
	The date when the ribbit has been posted.
	'''

	last_modified = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
	'''
	The date wen the ribbit has been updated; if it's not been updated, this field corresponds to date.
	'''

	def get_absolute_url(self):
		pass
